archdesc.runner: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.abstract: This collection consists of two World War I memorabilia items, a postal card and a membership card.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: World War I Memorabilia, 1918, 1964, in the Joseph M. Bruccoli Great War Collection #10875-p, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These items were given to the Library by Matthew J. Bruccoli, Bruccoli Clark Laymen, Inc., Columbia, South Carolina, on March 25, 1993.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This addition to the Joseph M. Bruccoli Great War Collection consists of two items, 1918 and 1964, a "Soldier's Mail" postal card, 1918 June 16, from L.H. Edwards to his wife, Mrs. L.H. Edwards, Appalachia, Virginia, mailed from Newport News, announcing his safe arrival overseas; and a membership card, 1964 October 1, for the year 1965 in the Gun Hill Post #271, Veterans of Foreign Wars of the United States, card #960, issued to Joseph M. Bruccoli.
